channel.description: Recent content in Python on Campus Coder

item.title: Automated Gradescope Submissions
item.description: The Problem The upgrade from our university’s websub system to gradescope looks and feels great for sure, but the approach of having to upload your files each time or maintaining a separate GitHub repo for each assignment is a pain. The whole process gets even worse when you have to deal with folders within your assignment. Solution! We have developed a tiny python script that will upload all the files in the folder placed in as a submission to gradescope.
